summary: This is an email chain from October 2019 regarding a victim of Jeffrey Epstein expressing interest in a meeting organized by the FBI's Victim Services but requesting a private session due to safety and reputation concerns. An FBI Victim Services representative forwards the request for follow-up.

persons.name: ME M
persons.context: An individual who identifies as a victim of Jeffrey Epstein emails the 'EpsteinVictimList' expressing interest in a victim meeting but requests a private session due to concerns about safety and reputation.

events.title: Victim Outreach and Meeting Coordination
events.description: Email correspondence regarding a planned meeting for Epstein victims, with a specific victim requesting a private session instead of a group setting.

keyFacts: A victim of Jeffrey Epstein reached out to an 'EpsteinVictimList' in October 2019 regarding a meeting for victims.
The victim expressed significant concerns about their safety and reputation, leading them to request a private meeting rather than attending a group session.
The communication was forwarded to the FBI's Victim Services division, indicating official outreach and coordination with victims following Epstein's arrest and death.
